content.rendered:
“OVER THE PAST 18 MONTHS, THE NUMBER OF STREAMING VIDEO SERVICES HAS EXPLODED,”
– Consumer Report

Streaming services are becoming more and more accessible and cost effective, with even some offering free (completely legal) services. Ascent Broadband offers an affordable high- speed connection that allows you the freedom to stream whatever service you’d like without the lag time of typical internet services. For more details on streaming services see the articles below.

Cord-Cutting Guide

Guide to Streaming

Stream Free Movies

Beware of Bundle Costs

Close
